the busiest man in radio. But I hope youre.not too busy to
do me a favor.

Can you send me a story? Get it to me by February 13
at the latest, ^ave it about one page, single spaced (I can
cut further if necessary). Tell about your station set-up,
operating problems and plans. Angle tft specifically to
the NAEB reader list; hence emphasize the things that other
station operators and educators m* ght waft to knw. Put in
anything els e you think should go in.
